LanguageData.OES_Wings.label: Heroic Eidolon Cyber-Wings
LanguageData.OES_Wings.description:
Heroic Cyber-Wings grant unmatched agility with their sleek, cutting-edge design. Designed for use by Eidolons, once called Heroes! Reveals the full potential of its owner.

These wings enable the user to perform 5 powerful jumps across vast distances.

Can be reloaded using Syntherius.
LanguageData.OES_Wings.verbs.heroic_jump.label: heroic jump
LanguageData.OMG_Wings.label: Mercenaries Cyber-Wings
LanguageData.OMG_Wings.description:
Highly modified Cyber-Wings grant unmatched agility with their sleek, cutting-edge design. Designed for use by Mercenaries.

These wings enable the user to perform 10 quick jumps across great distances.

Can be reloaded using Syntherius.
LanguageData.OMG_Wings.verbs.mercenary_jump.label: mercenary jump
